body.p: Dear Sir Enclosed I send you a copy of Judgment, and petition of T J Clark for the remission of the fine. Please present the Same to the Governor and if he can consistently remit it I think I can turn it to account here in august.
Make any trade you think proper with J Siggert in regard to the fee bill
